entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early in the evening. A few showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
